titles.title: A bill for relief of Kathy Butler and Charlotte James.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 4/28/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to two named individuals specified sums in full satisfaction of all claims arising out of the release of flood waters at a reservoir project in Arkansas.
